title: JYSK opens new location in Terrace

content_html: JYSK’s newest Canadian location S opened in Terrace on Aug. 9, drawing TERRACE crowds for a grand opening celebration TANDARD at 4730 Keith Ave. The company said in a Facebook post that the new store offers “over 21,000 square feet of style,” featuring 3210 Clinton Street furniture and home accessories. Nearly 250-638-7283 all items will be on sale for 20 to 60 per cent off during the event. www.terracestandard.com JYSK described the Terrace location as “thoughtfully designed to showcase JYSK products just the way you’d imagine them in your home,” with curated displays intended to help shoppers. The first 200 customers to arrive between 9 and 11 a.m. on opening day received a free $20 JYSK promo card, the company said. The event was free to attend, but JYSK cautioned shoppers to “beware of scammers attempting to sell tickets.” Denmark-based JYSK opened its first Canadian store in 1996 in Coquitlam, B.C., and now operates more than 70 locations across the country. The company is part of the international JYSK Group, which runs JYSK’s newest Canadian store opened in Terrace on Aug. 9, 2025, at 4730 Keith Ave., featuring 21,000 square feet of over 3,500 stores and web shops in furniture and home décor. The grand opening included major discounts and giveaway promo cards for early shoppers. 50 countries. (Submitted photo/Terrace Standard)
